Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz (initially built by Mr. Jin 25.03.2005 SCR 7992)
30.05.2014 SH SCR18934 Added special data access test to activate OCA301 if CLNT203_OFFICE = SCF
16.01.2014 SH SCR18651 Added test CLNT911_BANKSECRECY = Y for special data access test and error message
if data aaccess is ot allowed
17.09.2013 SH SCR18411 Added special data access test to activate OCA301 if CLNT101_ADMNO = 1 and CLNT208_HGROUP = ‘003’
and CLNT203_OFFICE = NL
24.02.2012 SH SCR17053 Introduced information barrier
03.02.2008 GB SCR13281/Note Changed call prg. OCA301
24.01.2008 SH SCR12424/13281 Changed tab triggering
20.01.2008 GB SCR13281 added activation prg. OCA301
03.04.2007 SH SCR12310 Removed transaction handling from "OCA300 Online"
09.06.2006 AK SCR11392 added "Button SwitchClientPrograms" functionality
-- According to GSET_YESNO(274) different labels for the tabs are fetched from
database
-- Call directly specific OCA300 tab, if program is called from another program
... else if called from the menu
... If called from somewhere, the tab 1 has to be called by default
-- Determine PID (Program ID) of selected tab, used to get permissions via GB900
... according to GSET_YESNO(274) the number of presented tabs is different
-- First time admin/client are unknown
-- According to GSET_YESNO(274) the number of presented tabs is different
-- OCA301 is called 6 times by presenting different results ini separate tabs
... tab Risk
... tab Correspondence
... tab Contracts
... tab Other
... tab Policies
... tab Mandates
-- Perform exit event if key Esc or button Cancel was pressed in one of the
tab programs
... call previous tab if users have no permissions for current selected tab but proper permissions
for previous tab
... else close OCA300
... remember previous tab, in case the tab has to be call again if users have
no permissions
... if key 'Tab' is pressed, the same actions as key 'Enter' should be processed
.. uses to know if users changes the client
-- Check permissions to access client data
-- In case of OCA301 special permissions (NL_CF_CORPORATES) have to be retreived from table USUG if
CLNT101_ADMNO = 1 and CLNT208_HGROUP = '003' and CLNT203_OFFICE = 'NL'
-- In case of OCA301 special permissions (SCFGROEP) have to be retreived from table USUG if
CLNT203_OFFICE = 'SCF'
-- Invalid client
... set back to previous client
... restart main tab incl. current selected tab for new selected client
... close current task
... close whole OCA300 in case of no client is accessed since FL start
-- User not allowed to access client data if CLNT101_ADMNO = 1 and CLNT208_HGROUP = ‘003’ and CLNT203_OFFICE = NL
and not member of user group = ‘NL_CORPORATES’
-- Message: "Access denied: The client is flagged as listed so the access to the archive is restricted"
-- User not allowed to access client data if CLNT203_OFFICE = SCF
and not member of user group = ‘SCFGROEP’
-- Message: "Access denied: The access to the SCF archive is restricted"
